annotation.spannedText: You can protect against chickenpox with safe, effective vaccination

classMention.mentionClass: You can protect against chickenpox with safe, effective vaccination

annotation.spannedText: The chickenpox vaccine is very safe, and it is effective at preventing chickenpox

classMention.mentionClass: The chickenpox vaccine is very safe, and it is effective at preventing chickenpox

annotation.spannedText: Vaccines, like any medicine, can have side effects

classMention.mentionClass: Vaccines, like any medicine, can have side effects

annotation.spannedText: Most people who get chickenpox vaccine do not have any problems with it

classMention.mentionClass: Most people who get chickenpox vaccine do not have any problems with it

annotation.spannedText: The vaccine is usually given in two doses

classMention.mentionClass: The vaccine is usually given in two doses

annotation.spannedText: Side effects are more likely after the first dose than after the second

classMention.mentionClass: Side effects are more likely after the first dose than after the second

annotation.spannedText: Serious side effects after the chickenpox vaccine are extremely rare

classMention.mentionClass: Serious side effects after the chickenpox vaccine are extremely rare

annotation.spannedText: Pregnant women, people who are moderately or severely ill at the time the shot is scheduled, and people allergic to any vaccine component should not get chickenpox vaccine

classMention.mentionClass: Pregnant women, people who are moderately or severely ill at the time the shot is scheduled, and people allergic to any vaccine component should not get chickenpox vaccine

annotation.spannedText: The chickenpox vaccine has been shown to be safe and well tolerated

classMention.mentionClass: The chickenpox vaccine has been shown to be safe and well tolerated

annotation.spannedText: Serious side effects linked to the vaccine were extremely rare

classMention.mentionClass: Serious side effects linked to the vaccine were extremely rare
